## PublicAppInfo type

Public information about a registered [application](./kibana-plugin-core-public.app.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PublicAppInfo = Omit<App, 'mount' | 'updater$'> & {
    legacy: false;
    status: AppStatus;
    navLinkStatus: AppNavLinkStatus;
    appRoute: string;
};
```
